text: The Sumgait pogrom was a pogrom by the local Azerbaijanis that targeted the Armenian population living in the Azerbaijani seaside town of Sumgait on February 1988. An estimated 30 were killed. But most say 200. ==Related pages== *Anti-Armenianism *Kirovabad pogrom *Khojaly Massacre *Maraghar Massacre *Nagorno-Karabakh War == Other websites == *Sumqait.com , *Aslan İsmayılov. Sumqayıt danışan tariximizdir. Sumqayıt şəhərinin 60 illik yubileyinə həsr olunmuş Biblioqrafik göstərici. Sumqayıt-2009. *sumgayit1988.com *Vladimir Kryuchkov. title: Sumgait pogrom
